meanings.definition: To coat or cover a surface with a layer of metal using an electric current.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic was electrodepositing the car parts to make them shiny.
meanings.sent2: The factory uses electrodepositing to add a protective layer to the products.
meanings.sent3: The artist tried electrodepositing glitter onto the canvas, but it didn't work well.
meanings.sent4: She imagined electrodepositing courage onto her heart to face the challenges ahead.
meanings.sent5: The scientist demonstrated electrodepositing by plating a coin with silver.

meanings.definition: The process of depositing a metal coating onto a surface using electricity.
meanings.sent1: Electrodepositing is commonly used in the automotive industry for rust prevention.
meanings.sent2: The quality of the electrodepositing determines the durability of the metal coating.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, the students observed the electrodepositing of copper onto a wire.
meanings.sent4: The jewelry maker admired the intricate patterns created through electrodepositing.
meanings.sent5: The workshop explained the science behind electrodepositing to the curious students.
